statements: DELETE FROM resource_planning WHERE resource_type = 'Doctor' AND project_end_date < '2022-07-01';
DELETE FROM resource_planning WHERE resource_type = 'Consultant' AND project_end_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM healthcare_administrators WHERE administrator_name = 'John Doe';

DELETE FROM healthcare_forecast
WHERE hospital_id = 123 AND forecast_accuracy < 90.00;
DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_id = 3 AND patient_age > 50;
DELETE FROM HealthServices WHERE service_category = 'Emergency' AND service_cost > 1000;
DELETE FROM MedicalRecords WHERE patient_id = 100 AND doctor_id = 200;
